Package uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.classification

Interface Summary
Classifier Defines the Classifier interface.
 

Class Summary
Bin A bin specifies a range of values between two doubles.
ClassifierStats  
Difference This classification calculates the difference between each ordered data value in the sorted list.
EqualInterval This classification splits the range of data into equal sized bins.
NaturalBreaks  
Quantile This classification assigns each class a quota of values given by the number of data values divided by the number of catogories desired plus a dealt remainder if there is any.
SimpleClassifier A trivial implementation of the classifier interface.
